post.body: ... My upper download line is crazy af lol

comment.body: Sadly, Twitter is a standard. Yet, ZeroMe (and ZeroNet) doesn't work on mobile phones as easily as doesn't scare newbies. Twitter is user friendly, while ZeroMe is privacy and censorship friendly.
Anyways, wait a few years and probably ZeroNet will become something more than this, just like every Internet project (eg. Linux) ;)
@Ekaterina: I guess the battery drain is because it downloads and uploads many files every time, like a torrent
